channel.title: Banner, is this good for a second or third time?
channel.description:
Hi, I am CopyRight -
I was wondering if this is pretty good for a forum, I made it for Ikiliki just incase he wants a different one.
[IMG]http://img229.imageshack.us/img229/4064/rlbanneriy0.jpg[/img]

item.title: Banner, is this good for a second or third time?
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Mopman:

Yo, lock it.

I always forget to after I post.

Read full topic

item.title: Banner, is this good for a second or third time?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Something to think about in the future for Symmetrical type work:

If you want 2 of the same things, on opposite sides; Select the layer in which to multiply, press Ctrl+J. Now press Ctrl+T, right click on it with your move tool and select ‘Flip Horizontal’, or Vertical depending on what your doing. Then move it to the respected place. Completely identical, and its very easy to do.

…I also fear this is more for the Advertisement though; Because the banner links back to the site.

Read full topic
item.source: Banner, is this good for a second or third time?

item.title: Banner, is this good for a second or third time?
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:10, topic:149855”][quote author=Bobby link=topic=205312.msg1810613#msg1810613 date=1191832445]
now that you mention it, i agree. the uneven sides looks pretty bad. try and make the right side loook like the left one, cause the right side looks worse
[/quote]

Arghhhh!!!

You do not have to fucking agree with everyone. You said what you wanted to say. Leave at that. Stop fucking posting these “Oh yeah actually I agree with you LOL” comments.[/quote]

Oh yeah, I actually disagree with you.

We’re helping.

Read full topic
